info.label: Your Profession
info.brief: A brief description of yourself as a candidate that appears in some résumé themes. You may use **Markdown** and/or HTML formatting here including [links](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random) or stick to plain text.

employment.summary: Optional overall employment summary. Not used in most themes.

history.summary: Made contributions to many different projects ranging from signal processing algorithms to analytic tools and web interfaces.
highlights: Developed and deployed a system for automatic signal detection and classification. Detection information is stored in a SQL database which can be viewed by analysts using a custom Qt interface or a webpage.
Developed a WebSocket interface for the next major version of X-Midas (M50), an SDR framework used by the Intelligence Community, to bring signal analysis to the web.

Created an efficient implementation of various DSP algorithms, including a Maximum Likelihood Sequence Estimator (MLSE) demod and a wideband detector for identifying signals with repeated sync patterns.
Built tools for identifying corresponding uplink/downlink frequencies for a particular signal. Includes efficient DSP algorithms as well as analytic tools leveraging MongoDB.

history.employer: Duke University Center for In Vivo Microscopy
history.summary: Supported post-docs and PhD candidates working in the Duke University CIVM by developing software and data visualizations.
highlights: Developed algorithms in MATLAB to identify and measure spherical structures in extremely high resolution (15μm voxels) 3D MRI data - lead to a publication.
Created visualizations of 3D brain, kidney and heart MRI data.

projects.title: Awesome Project #1
projects.summary: Show off your project work with a Markdown-and-HTML friendly summary of your role on the project. Software projects, creative projects, business projects can all appear here.
projects.description: A description of the project, for audiences that may not be familiar with it. Like the summary section, can include **Markdown** and inline HTML formatting.

projects.title: Asteroids
projects.summary: Conceived, designed, implemented, and created 3D Asteroids space shooter with Unreal Engine IV and C++.
projects.description: A 3D Asteroids clone with Unreal 4 and cross-platform C++.

education.summary: Optional overall education summary. Not used in most themes.

history.title: M.Eng. Electrical Engineering
history.summary: Graduate of Virginia Tech, Spring of 2015.

history.title: B.S. Computer Engineering
history.summary: Graduate of Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology, Summer of 2011. Specialized in Digital Signal Processing and communcations.
A summary of your volunteer experience at this organization. Can include **Markdown** and inline HTML formatting.
A summary of your service experience with this organization. Can include **Markdown** and inline HTML formatting.

samples.title: Creative Sample #2
samples.summary: Another technical or creative sample. You can use [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/) here.

writing.title: Something I Wrote Once

recognition.summary: For work in promotion and popularization of SpinWidget technology.
